= Components =

|| *Component Code* || *Component Name* || *Function* || *Comments* ||
|| *HMA.MM.CJ* || Cajal Nucleus || Integration of head and eye movements || ||
|| *HMA.MM.MSTR* || Mesencephalic Trigeminal Nucleus || Facial Somatic Sensations || Lower, mandibular - ganglion, 1-order sensory ||
|| *HMA.HP.FCM* || Facial Motor Nucleus || Control of face || Pons ||
|| *HMA.HP.TRM* || Trigeminal Motor Nucleus || Muscles of first branchial arch || Pontine Nuclei, lower face and jaw control, Motor Nucleus of V n. ||
|| *HMA.HP.PTR* || Principal Trigeminal Nucleus || Facial Somatic Sensations || Upper, maxillary, ophthalmic ||
|| *HMA.HP.PN.KFN* || Kolliker-Fuse Nucleus || Control of protruder tongue muscles contraction to maintain respiration || To hypoglossal nucleus ||
|| *HMA.HP.PN.SC* || Nucleus Subceruleus || Tongue control || To hypoglossal nucleus ||
|| *HMA.HP.GCR* || Gigantocellular Reticular Nucleus || Mediate head movements || Projects to hypoglossal nucleus ||
|| *HMA.HP.CRF* || Caudal Pontine Reticular Nucleus || Mediate head movements || Grinding of the teeth in sleep ||
|| *HMA.HP.RPO* || Oral Pontine Reticular Nucleus || Mediation of changing to and from REM sleep || part of horizontal gaze center ||
|| *HMA.HP.PDT* || Pontine Reticulotegmental Nucleus || Mediate saccadic eye movements || Inactivation leads to deficit of expression, but not learning ||
|| *HMA.HM.STR* || Spinal Trigeminal Nucleus || Discriminative sensation and light touch of face, conscious proprioception || Pontine Nuclei, part of cranial nerve nuclei, ear ||
|| *HMA.HM.HYG* || Hypoglossal Motor Nucleus || Control of tongue || ||
|| *HMA.HM.AMB* || Nucleus Ambiguus || Control muscles of pharynx || on par with VGM, speech ||
|| *HMA.HM.SSL* || Superior Salivatory Nucleus || Eye water || ||
|| *HMA.HM.ISL* || Inferior Salivatory Nucleus || Control of parotid gland || swallowing ||
|| *HMA.HM.SOL* || Solitarius Nucleus || Carry taste buds, thoracic and abdominal viscera || c.n. VII, IX, X ||
|| *HMA.HM.INM* || Intercalated Nucleus of Medulla || Coordinate tongue movements || Receives sensory inputs from neck region ||
|| *HMA.HM.PA5* || Paratrigeminal Nucleus || Orofacial nociceptive sensory processing || somatosensory reflex, site for nociceptive inputs from sciatic innervation field ||
|| *HMA.SC.ISL* || Spinal Accessory Nucleus || Control of neck || Rotate head ||
